job title: Site Reliability Engineering Solutions Architect Dell Data Security DevOps
job description:
Job Title

Site Reliability Engineering Solutions Architect Dell Data Security DevOps

Location
Richardson, TX

Dell provides the technology that transforms the way we all work and live. But we are more than a technology company we are a people company. We inspire, challenge and respect every one of our over 100,000 employees. We also provide them with unparalleled growth and development opportunities. We cant wait for you to discover this for yourself as a Site Reliability Engineering Solutions Architect on our Dell Data Security DevOps team in Richardson, TX.

The Software Engineering team delivers next-generation software application enhancements and new products for a changing world. Working at the cutting edge, we design and develop software for platforms, peripherals, applications and diagnostics all with the most advanced technologies, tools, software engineering methodologies and the collaboration of internal and external partners.

Key Responsibilities
  • Collaborate with other team members to provide innovative solutions to complex problems
  • Design, develop, and implement tools and solutions to support agile development process
  • Evaluate new technologies and integrate those that add value and drive efficiency
  • Develop tools and plugins that leverage cloud-based VMs for automated testing
  • Drive scale and stability improvements to existing build tools and processes
Essential Requirements
  • BS or MS in Computer Science or Computer Engineering
  • Strong understanding of cloud technology (especially AWS) with a broad understanding of infrastructure and AWS Ecosystem technologies.
  • Significant experience in the design of distributed, high availability server-based network computing infrastructures; AWS and Azure design, build and/or operational experience.
  • Knowledge and experience with object orientated programming languages such as Java, C#, C/C++
  • Understand the concepts and best practices related to application lifecycle process, agile development, secure development, use of cloud, DevOps, high availability, disaster recovery, monitoring and automation, change management
  • Must be highly motivated and willing to work and learn in a team environment
  • Must have strong communication skills
  • Must be able to work with minimal day-to-day direction
Desirable Requirements
  • Demonstrated leadership experience in Software Development teams
  • Familiar with agile development tools such as JIRA, Confluence, Bamboo and Jenkins
  • Experience with Python, Powershell, Docker, Kubernetes, Puppet, Chef
  • Good understanding of Linux tools and administration AWS certifications
Benefits
We offer highly competitive salaries, bonus programs, world-class benefits, and unparalleled growth and development opportunities all to create a compelling and rewarding work environment.

If youre ready to develop cutting-edge software for a changing world, this is your opportunity to develop with Dell.
